<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Expands tree item pointed to by the path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''tvExpand''' [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Item [[Tree View Path]]. [] will expand the whole tree if it was collapsed previously with [] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvExpand]] path </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
